home.title: Welcome to SoilMitra
home.subtitle: Your AI-powered organic farming and fertilizer schedule assistant.

description.part1: SoilMitra is an online service created by SREE Marudhan Agro Care for farmers.
description.part2: It helps farmers use organic fertilizers correctly. Our goal is to improve soil health, select suitable organic fertilizers for crops, and provide simple guidance on when and how to use them.
description.part3: This reduces the need for chemical fertilizers and allows farming to be done naturally, easily, and at lower cost.
description.part4: SoilMitra will be a friend and guide for every farmer who wants to grow healthy crops and protect farm land.
